name: Galactic Gluttony
description:
Agent Red has one job, to hide the existence of aliens. But when a UFO shows up and starts dropping their food everywhere, things start to get a little troublesome. The fastest way to get rid of all the food? Eating it, obviously.

FEATURES:

  • A cute girl who gains weight.
  • An endless desert to drive in.
  • Gallery and achievements.
  • Censored and uncensored options.

HOW TO PLAY:

Drive through an endless desert while dodging obstacles and eating food. If you get hurt 3 times, it's game over. Try to survive as long as you can and gather as much food as you can eat along the way.
